name: European Concrete Platform
goal:
The European Concrete Platform ASBL (ECP), is a European association incorporated as a non-profit association under Belgian law. Its objective is to study and promote all aspects of concrete for construction. The ECP aims to promote concrete as the material of choice providing building solutions for sustainable development and sustainable construction.

The ECP's members are:
- BIBM - European Federation for Precast Concrete
- CEMBUREAU – The European Cement Association
- EFCA – European Federation of Concrete Admixtures Associations
- ERMCO – European Ready Mixed Concrete Organisation
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Transport
euInitiatives: Level(s) – framework for assessment of buildings, PEF4buildings, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive review, Smart Readiness Indicator for Buildings, CLP: Commission proposal to introduce new annex on harmonized information to poison centres, Review of the Construction Products Regulation, Investment and innovation in C&DW recycling infrastructure, Design for Deconstruction and Durability of Buildings, Digitalisation, Organisation’s membership in committees: CEN/TC 250 (active member), CEN/TC 350 (via delegate), CEN/TC 351 (via delegate), CEN/TC 127 (via delegate), ISO/TC 92/SC 4 - Fire safety engineering (via delegate)
